choices: Emma leads you to her classroom!
Emma leads you to another part of the school!
Oh, Emma's fine! Abandon her and go exploring on your own!
1.content:
"But I don't WANNA be in a school full of hungry girls!"

You whined from your seat in the back of the car. Your little 5-year-old sister Emma giggled in her car seat next to you. Your Mom shushed you.

"Shut it young man, before I eat you myself! Now, you'll do as you're told! Your little sister needs her big brother to watch her at school since that maniac Susan's daughter tried to eat her!"

Your mother hissed. That was just the way things were in the world you lived in. Vore was commonplace, but only girls had the ability to do it. This meant that boys typically fell into the role of food for girls.

Finally, you arrived at HeartDrop School for Girls. This school was actually a Montessori, which meant that there wasn't much adult supervision of the children. To your genuine surprise, you saw a few other boys chaperoning their little sisters. And just like you, they looked terrified.

"Have a great day Emma!"

Your mother said, even though both her children were in front of her. She drove off, leaving you stranded here at a Montessori school for girls.

Where will you go now? What will you do?
1.title: Welcome to HeartDrop School for Girls!

11.content:
"C'mon! We're gonna be late!"
Emma shouted as she tugged your arm. She pulled you through the halls of the school until you entered her classroom. There, she directed you towards a seat labeled "guest corner." As Emma took her seat, the teacher, an anthro fox, walked into the classroom.
"Alright girls, settle down. As I'm sure you've noticed, we have a guest today. This is Emma's brother. He's here to chaperone Emma since Becky tried to eat her."
The teacher explained. The class all glared at Becky, who shrunk into her seat. Eating boys was common and normal, but eating girls was considered taboo.
"I want you all to leave him alone. Any questions?"
The teacher finished, looking for raised hands.
11.title: Emma leads you to her classroom!

choices: The girls immediately rush you! It's a Feeding Frenzy!
111.content:
"Yes Emma?"
The teacher asked. Emma smirked.
"Ms. Matthews, I don't need a chaperone. I can take care of myself."
She announced loud and proud. You felt your blood run cold.
"Oh. Well in that case, good luck boy."
Ms. Matthews said with a chuckle. The girls in the classroom all giggled, knowing they wouldn't have anything in between their bellies and you!
111.title: Emma raised her hand!

choices: Climb the nearby cabinet! It's too high for them!
1111.content:
The girls immediately get up from their chairs and rush you! They all screamed things like,
"He's mine!" "C'mere snacky!" "Can't wait to digest you!" What are you gonna do?!
1111.title: The girls immediately rush you! It's a Feed...

12.content: Where is she leading you to?
12.title: Emma leads you to another part of the school!

choices: Turns you into underwear or a diaper!
Turns you into a bar of chocolate, her favorite!
121.content:
"C'mon big brother! I wanna show you something!"

Emma says excitedly as she grabs your hand and tugs, leading you through the halls. You don't really get a chance to look around at the hallways since Emma is leading you so quickly. Finally, you reach a cold room full of gadgets and gizmos. The science lab. Girls were around the room, performing all sorts of science experiments. some of them saw you and snickered, but they mostly kept to themselves. Emma took a device that looked like a remote off a table and pointed it at you.

"Look! Look what this thing does!"

She says excitedly before pushing a button. A beam of light shoots out of the remote and...
121.title: The science lab!

info.brief_description: An older brother needs to chaperone his little sister at school. Too bad he's on the menu.
info.description:
My first posting on this site, go easy on me.

Welcome, welcome! After checking out a bunch of interactives on this site, I've been inspired to create my own! So, here it is.

You play as Jack, a 7-year-old boy. He has been tasked with chaperoning his little 5-year-old sister at her girls-only school. There's just one problem, this is a vore-filled world, and boys are always the prey for girls! Will Jack make it out alive? Or will he be food for a little girl?

Here are the rules:
-No sex and nothing about genitalia.
-Characters can be either human or anthro and can be between the ages of 1-12.
-All types of vore are allowed, except for unbirth.
-Non-digestion is allowed, but digestion is preferred.
-Scat is allowed.
-Shrinking is allowed.
-Diaper play is allowed.
-Try to put some effort into posts. Like, a complete sentence or two at least.
-Other fetishes are allowed too, such as farting and squashing.
-Have fun!
info.pretty_title: A Boy in A Vore-Crazy Girls' School
